balanceOf(address).intent: Display the number of USDC.e held by the specified address.

transfer(address,uint256).intent: Send a specified amount of USDC.e from your wallet to another address.

approve(address,uint256).intent: Authorize another address to spend a specified amount of your USDC.e on your behalf.

allowance(address,address).intent: Check the remaining amount of USDC.e that the spender is permitted to spend from the owner's balance.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).intent: Transfer a specified amount of USDC.e from one address to another.
